absl_cc_library(
  NAME
    btree
  HDRS
    "btree_map.h"
    "btree_set.h"
    "internal/btree.h"
    "internal/btree_container.h"
  COPTS
    ${ABSL_DEFAULT_COPTS}
  LINKOPTS
    ${ABSL_DEFAULT_LINKOPTS}
  DEPS
    abslx::container_common
    abslx::compare
    abslx::compressed_tuple
    abslx::container_memory
    abslx::cord
    abslx::core_headers
    abslx::layout
    abslx::memory
    abslx::strings
    abslx::throw_delegate
    abslx::type_traits
    abslx::utility
)

absl_cc_library(
  NAME
    btree_test_common
  hdrs
    "btree_test.h"
  COPTS
    ${ABSL_TEST_COPTS}
  LINKOPTS
    ${ABSL_DEFAULT_LINKOPTS}
  DEPS
    abslx::btree
    abslx::cord
    abslx::flat_hash_set
    abslx::strings
    abslx::time
  TESTONLY
)

absl_cc_test(
  NAME
    btree_test
  SRCS
    "btree_test.cc"
  COPTS
    ${ABSL_TEST_COPTS}
  LINKOPTS
    ${ABSL_DEFAULT_LINKOPTS}
  DEPS
    abslx::btree
    abslx::btree_test_common
    abslx::compare
    abslx::core_headers
    abslx::counting_allocator
    abslx::flags
    abslx::hash_testing
    abslx::raw_logging_internal
    abslx::strings
    abslx::test_instance_tracker
    abslx::type_traits
    gmock_main
)
